query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alert_webhook_configs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  channel_type ENUM('slack', 'teams', 'email', 'discord', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  webhook_url VARCHAR(500),
  email_recipients JSON,
  email_subject_template VARCHAR(255),
  slack_channel VARCHAR(100),
  slack_bot_token VARCHAR(255),
  teams_webhook_url VARCHAR(500),
  alert_types JSON,
  production_line_ids JSON,
  machine_ids JSON,
  min_severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'warning' NOT NULL,
  rate_limit_minutes INT DEFAULT 5,
  last_alert_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  test_mode INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alert_webhook_configs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  channel_type ENUM('slack', 'teams', 'email', 'discord', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  webhook_url VARCHAR(500),
  email_recipients JSON,
  email_subject_template VARCHAR(255),
  slack_channel VARCHAR(100),
  slack_bot_token VARCHAR(255),
  teams_webhook_url VARCHAR(500),
  alert_types JSON,
  production_line_ids JSON,
  machine_ids JSON,
  min_severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'warning' NOT NULL,
  rate_limit_minutes INT DEFAULT 5,
  last_alert_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  test_mode INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
)
